item.description:
FYI: The Museum of Science is having a free admission day this Friday from 9-9pm. Join us at front lobby so we can explore the Museum. Sorry for the short notice, but hope you can make it.

How to get there by MBTA:

Take the M.B.T.A.'s Green Line subway to Science
Park station. This will be the Green Line's
Lechmere-bound "E" train. The Museum is diagonally
across the street (O'Brien Highway), just over the
Charles River Dam draw bridge.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the front lobby area

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Museum of Science - Friday Nite (free admission)
